type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Vigilance, reach
[i]Sol[/i] – Whenever Ephraim, Solar Prince attacks, him and another target creature you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
[i]Sacred Twins [/i]– As long as you control a creature named Eirika, creatures you control have vigilance.
Partner with Eirika, Lunar Princess [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Eirika into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
